name: Happy 30th, Chris!
description:
Happy Birthday you huge nerd from all of us to you. <3

Hit that fullscreen button!! Click to interact, click and drag to move the camera. Mouse wheel to zoom in and out.

If you're getting an odd white screen, try switching browser!

Music: https://www.freemusicarchive.org/music/Ketsa/the-new-world/old-thoughts
Programming by Lewis Walton
Notes contributed by:
https://www.instagram.com/icedcoffeecatstudios/
https://www.instagram.com/mattman_s/
Project has no association with ArenaNet, Guild Wars 2 screenshots included purely for the memories.
